name: THE MOST EPIC NIGHT WITH DUMBO 2
name_original: THE MOST EPIC NIGHT WITH DUMBO 2
description:
The second EPIC installment in the dumbo series!

Deal with 5 characters this time!

The phone guy will give you hints on how to beat dumbo and friends, so listen to him!

This game WILL have future updates, so for now, there isn't as much content as there is in the first game.

Good luck!
